      • withCustomData

        T withCustomData()
        Ensures that when retrieving a Tenant, the Tenant's customData is also retrieved in the same request. This enhances performance by leveraging a single request to retrieve multiple related resources you know you will use.
        Returns:
        this instance for method chaining.
        Since:
        1.0.0

      • withAccounts

        T withAccounts()
        Ensures that when retrieving a Tenant, the associated accounts are also retrieved in the same request.

        If you wish to control pagination parameters (offset and limit) for the returned accounts, see the withAccounts(limit) or withAccounts(limit,offset) methods.

        Returns:
        this instance for method chaining.
        Since:
        1.0.RC4.6

      • withAccounts

        T withAccounts(int limit)
        Ensures that when retrieving a Tenant, the associated accounts are also retrieved in the same request.
        Parameters:
        limit - defines the maximum quantity of items to be retrieved when expanding this Collection Resource. Min:1, Max: 100. The default value is 25.
        Returns:
        this instance for method chaining.
        Since:
        1.0.RC4.6

      • withAccounts

        T withAccounts(int limit,
               int offset)
        Ensures that when retrieving a Tenant, the associated accounts are also retrieved in the same request.
        Parameters:
        limit - defines the maximum quantity of items to be retrieved when expanding this Collection Resource. Min:1, Max: 100. The default value is 25.
        offset - the zero-based starting index in the entire collection of the first item to return. Default is 0
        Returns:
        this instance for method chaining.
        Since:
        1.0.RC4.6

      • withGroups

        T withGroups()
        Ensures that when retrieving a Tenant, the associated groups are also retrieved in the same request.

        If you wish to control pagination parameters (offset and limit) for the returned groups, see the withGroups(limit) or withGroups(limit,offset) methods.

        Returns:
        this instance for method chaining.
        Since:
        1.0.RC4.6

      • withOrganizations

        T withOrganizations()
        Ensures that when retrieving a Tenant, the associated organizations are also retrieved in the same request.

        If you wish to control pagination parameters (offset and limit) for the returned groups, see the withOrganizations(limit) or withOrganizations(limit,offset) methods.

        Returns:
        this instance for method chaining.
        Since:
        1.0.RC5

      • withOrganizations

        T withOrganizations(int limit)

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        this instance for method chaining.
